Class OrderDAO

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.database.OrderDAO
public class OrderDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Order operations. Handles all database operations related to orders.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderDAO()
    Constructor - initializes database adapter.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public int create(Order order)
      Creates a new order.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to create
      Returns:
      The created order ID, or -1 if failed

    • addOrderItem

      public boolean addOrderItem(int orderId, OrderItem item)
      Adds an order item to the database.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      item - The order item
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • findByUser

      public List<Order> findByUser(int userId)
      Gets all orders for a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The customer ID
      Returns:
      List of orders

    • findPending

      public List<Order> findPending()
      Gets all pending orders (available for carriers).
      Returns:
      List of pending orders

    • findByCarrierSelected

      public List<Order> findByCarrierSelected(int carrierId)
      Gets all orders selected by a specific carrier.
      Parameters:
      carrierId - The carrier ID
      Returns:
      List of selected orders

    • findByCarrierCompleted

      public List<Order> findByCarrierCompleted(int carrierId)
      Gets all orders completed by a specific carrier.
      Parameters:
      carrierId - The carrier ID
      Returns:
      List of completed orders

    • findAll

      public List<Order> findAll()
      Gets all orders (for owner view).
      Returns:
      List of all orders

    • selectOrder

      public boolean selectOrder(int orderId, int carrierId)
      Selects an order for a carrier (changes status to SELECTED). Uses transaction to handle concurrency.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      carrierId - The carrier ID
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if already selected

    • completeOrder

      public boolean completeOrder(int orderId, LocalDateTime deliveryTime)
      Completes an order (changes status to DELIVERED).
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      deliveryTime - The actual delivery time
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • cancelOrder

      public boolean cancelOrder(int orderId)
      Cancels an order within allowed time frame (24 hours from order placement).
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • canCancelOrder

      public boolean canCancelOrder(int orderId)
      Checks if an order can still be cancelled (within 24 hours).
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      Returns:
      true if the order can be cancelled

    • getHoursRemainingToCancel

      public int getHoursRemainingToCancel(int orderId)
      Gets the hours remaining to cancel an order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      Returns:
      Hours remaining, or -1 if cannot be cancelled

    • getOrderItems

      public List<OrderItem> getOrderItems(int orderId)
      Gets all items for an order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      Returns:
      List of order items

    • findById

      public Order findById(int orderId)
      Gets an order by ID.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order ID
      Returns:
      Order or null if not found

    • findByStatus

      public List<Order> findByStatus(String status)
      Gets orders by status.
      Parameters:
      status - The order status
      Returns:
      List of orders with the specified status

      Gets total sales amount.

    • getSalesByProduct

      public ResultSet getSalesByProduct()
      Gets sales by product for reports.
      Returns:
